item.description: The A²R Lab at Barnard College, Columbia University, focuses on developing and implementing open-source algorithms for dynamic motion planning and control of robots by exploiting both the mathematical structure of algorithms and the design of computational platforms (e.g., MPCGPU, GRiD, TinyMPC). As such, our research is at the intersection of Robotics and Computer Architecture, Embedded Systems, Numerical Optimization, and Machine Learning. We also want to improve the accessibility of STEM education.
